name: Plague (Mr. Glass)
description:
This was a project I decided to work on to test out some features in 2D, along with learning more of the Unity workflow.

Feel free to play this all you want, and provide any feedback you think would benefit the production.

There will probably not be many (if any) updates to this, it will depend on how I feel, and if I have time to work on it.

There, are a few known problems: Word-spacing, continuous bag spawning, and various lag issues.

I hope you enjoy what I've made!

-Glass
